get.description: Full scores and gameday info delivered live and post-game. Live data includes half and score info. Gameday info includes weather, TV channel etc

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: competition
parameters.description: An indication of a soccer competition/league. This value can be the CompetitionId or the Competition Key. Possible values include: EPL, 1, MLS, 8, etc.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
The date of the game(s).
Examples: 2017-02-27, 2017-09-01.

get.description: A list of countries, continents etc. for finding their respective competitions.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

get.description: A list of all competitions (leagues, cups etc.) and their associated countries or areas.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

get.description: Full team information: team name and city, conference and division, and colors. Also contains basic fantasy info such as IDs as well as full stadium data. This endpoint returns the teams ever associated with a competition; use Team Profiles - by Season for just the current ones.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: competition
parameters.description: An indication of a soccer competition/league. This value can be the CompetitionId or the Competition Key. Possible values include: EPL, 1, MLS, 8, etc.

get.description: Stadium information from across the world

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

get.description: Full team information: team name and city, conference and division, and colors. Also contains basic fantasy info such as IDs as well as full stadium data. This endpoint returns the teams currently associated with a competition's active season; use Team Profiles - by Competition for all-time (e.g. teams since relegated from the EPL.)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: competition
parameters.description: An indication of a soccer competition/league. This value can be the CompetitionId or the Competition Key. Possible values include: EPL, 1, MLS, 8, etc.

parameters.name: seasonid
parameters.description: Unique FantasyData Season ID. SeasonIDs can be found in the Competition Hierarchy (League Hierarchy). Examples: 1, 2, 3, etc

get.description: Home and away teams, date and time, season type and week etc. are included. Also includes gameday information. This includes full stadium information (capacity, lat/long, surface etc.), top-line betting information (spread, moneyline, total), weather conditions, and broadcast information.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: competition
parameters.description: An indication of a soccer competition/league. This value can be the CompetitionId or the Competition Key. Possible values include: EPL, 1, MLS, 8, etc.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Year of the season
Examples: 2020, 2021, etc.

get.description: A list of all recently changed memberships (e.g. player transfers, releases) for a given competition, called by number of days ago.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: competition
parameters.description: An indication of a soccer competition/league. This value can be the CompetitionId or the Competition Key. Possible values include: EPL, 1, MLS, 8, etc.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: The number of days since memberships were updated. For example, if you pass 3, you'll receive all memberships that have been updated in the past 3 days. Valid entries are: 1, 2 ... 30

get.description: Memberships (players' membership of a team) that have since been revoked by our system.

parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

get.description: A lightweight schedule endpoint without gameday information. Home and away teams, the date and time of the game, and season type, week etc. are included. Ideal for the most basic information required to build a schedule.
